articles.title: Russian-held Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant disconnected from power grid for second day after nearby fires
articles.description: Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, which is held by Russian forces, is still disconnected from the country's power grid, a day after being disconnected for the first time in its history, according to the country's nuclear operator.

articles.title: Court: Arkansas can't ban treatment of transgender kids
articles.description: LITTLE ROCK, Ark. (AP) — A federal appeals court on Thursday said Arkansas can't enforce its ban on transgender children receiving gender-affirming medical care.
